generatedPrompts.frontCover: A watercolor painting of a charming, slightly frazzled cartoon squirrel wearing a tiny party hat, struggling to balance a giant, wobbly stack of birthday presents. One gift is precariously teetering on its head. The squirrel has a look of comical determination. The background is a soft wash of light blue and yellow, with artistic paint splatters and visible paper texture. In the center, written in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script, is the text "Happy Birthday, John!". The entire scene is flat 2D, with soft, flowing colors, organic paint bleeds, and visible brush strokes, evoking a lighthearted and humorous feel.
generatedPrompts.backCover: A minimalist and serene watercolor painting that complements the front cover. The background is a full-bleed soft wash of light blue and yellow, with visible paper texture and subtle, artistic paint splatters. A single, small, beautifully wrapped gift box from the front cover, painted in soft, flowing colors, rests peacefully in the upper-left quadrant. The overall style is flat 2D, with organic paint bleeds and visible brush strokes. The bottom-right corner, approximately 1-inch square, is left completely undecorated with only the plain watercolor wash background, ensuring it is clear for a QR code. There is no text on the back.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A full-bleed decorative watercolor painting continuing the artistic style from the front cover. The background is a seamless soft wash of light blue and yellow with visible paper texture and gentle paint splatters. A beautiful, abstract cascade of colorful watercolor ribbons and confetti gracefully floats down from the top-left corner towards the bottom-right. The ribbons have soft, flowing colors and organic paint bleeds, harmonizing with the main color palette. The composition is artistic and lighthearted, creating a festive yet uncluttered feel. There are no characters or text, just celebratory abstract elements.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A beautiful watercolor painting with integrated text. The background is a full-bleed, soft wash of light blue and yellow, with visible paper texture and subtle, artistic paint bleeds. Delicate watercolor confetti and swirling ribbons, matching the left interior, frame the top and bottom corners without obscuring the central area. Positioned safely in the center, away from all edges, is the message written in a beautiful, highly readable handwritten cursive script with high contrast against the background: "Happy Birthday John! Hope your special day is filled with joy, laughter, and all your favorite things. Wishing you an amazing year ahead!". The handwriting is elegant yet perfectly clear, and the artwork enhances the heartfelt, lighthearted tone of the message.
